item.title: My Blogs
item.author: tzt19@mails.tsinghua.edu.cn
item.description:
MLFA

I am writing a Chinese column Machine Learning in Football Analytics (MLFA) at Zhihu. I notice that this area is much less popular in China than in the west and there is almost no Chinese materials introducing it. Therefore, I write the column to popularize this field, especially among people who are interested in football and machine learning. I wish this field will get more attention in China in the future.
